E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1988
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
The time has come. I'll leave the show after this year.
I guess I will have to make room for the young players.

Sincerely,
Dave Goltz



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Jeff Heathcock
Dear Sir,
Jeff Heathcock has nothing more to prove at A Burlington Braves!
He has an ERA of 1.64 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Kevin Bass
Dear Sir,
Kevin Bass has nothing more to prove at A Burlington Braves!
He has an AVG of .355 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Status of Brian Fisher
Dear Sir,
Brian Fisher has an ERA of 6.75 at AA Greenville Braves.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
